original_text: Since the time that your ancestors left Egypt, I have sent my servants, the prophets to speak to you. I have continued to do that many times, even until now.
korean_text: 너희 조상들이 애굽 땅에서 나온 날부터 오늘까지 내가 내 종 선지자들을 너희에게 보내되 끊임없이 보내었으나

sentences.original_text: Since the time that your ancestors left Egypt,
I have sent my servants, the prophets
I have continued to do that many times,
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그것을 여러 번 계속해 왔습니다
